short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to change brightness of any website (where it is possible).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension allow you to change brightness of any website (where it is possible). 
Brightness control just protects your eyes from annoying bright colors.
